mapper.select: SELECT YEAR(date) as year FROM events WHERE status = 2 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT DISTINCT YEAR(date) as year FROM events ORDER BY year

SELECT events.id AS event_id, events.date AS event_date, events.location AS event_location, events.ground AS event_ground, events.type AS event_type, events.opponent AS event_opponent, events.status AS event_status, events.note AS event_note, events.expense AS event_expense, games.id AS game_id, games.event_id AS game_event_id, games.result AS game_result, games.batFirst AS game_bat_first, games.scoreA AS game_score_a, games.scoreB AS game_score_b, games.pointGot AS game_point_got, games.pointLost AS game_point_lost FROM events LEFT OUTER JOIN games ON events.id = games.event_id WHERE events.id = #{id}

SELECT batters.id AS batter_id, batters.event_id AS batter_event_id, batters.member_id AS batter_member_id, batters.bOrder AS batter_order, members.id AS member_id, members.nick_name AS member_nickname FROM batters INNER JOIN members ON batters.member_id = members.id WHERE batters.event_id = #{id} ORDER BY batters.bOrder
SELECT * FROM battings WHERE battings.batter_id = #{id} ORDER BY battings.inning, battings.number
SELECT * FROM events WHERE events.status = 2 AND events.type IN ('練習', '合宿', '練習試合', 'オーシャンリーグ') ORDER BY events.date DESC LIMIT #{n}

SELECT events.id AS event_id, events.date AS event_date, events.type AS event_type FROM events WHERE events.status = 2 AND events.type IN ('練習', '合宿', '練習試合', 'オーシャンリーグ') ORDER BY events.date DESC LIMIT #{n}
SELECT * FROM members RIGHT OUTER JOIN attendees ON attendees.member_id = members.id RIGHT OUTER JOIN events ON attendees.event_id = events.id WHERE events.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO events (date, location, ground, type, opponent, status, note, expense) VALUES (#{date}, #{location}, #{ground}, #{type}, #{opponent}, #{status}, #{note}, #{expense})
mapper.update: UPDATE events SET date = #{date}, location = #{location}, ground = #{ground}, type = #{type}, opponent = #{opponent}, status = #{status}, note = #{note}, expense = #{expense} WHERE id = #{id}
